Anti-cheat system is very good. 
There is no hacker/cheater.
Chinese are very friendly
Community is not toxic at all
Match making is fair, no smurf at all.

Source: Trust me, bro

Se você gosta de passar um pouco de nervoso durante as partidas de MM esse é o jogo certo!
Mas de forma geral o jogo e excelente!
PS: Tirando o hackers que são encontrados durante as partidas, isso frusta muito o game.

Un juego demasiado bueno y para nada repetitivo, los modos de juegos son muy buenos aunque no vendria mal alguno nuevo, hay errores para solucinar por ejemplo los chiteros o hackers ya que te arruina la experiencia, pero sacando de lado eso es un juego fantastico y muy divertido.
verry nice team game . 1 bad thing is that it really takes long to play competitive because of the long cooldown

CS:GO offers special entertainment and a unique experience for a lot of gamers. If you’re a fan of shooters, you should give CS:GO a try. The game is completely free since December 2018, has low system requirements, doesn’t take much to get into, and offers an opportunity to make a good buck while having fun. What’s there not to like?
